mapper.select: SELECT Project1.MEM_ID CODE_ID , Project1.MEM_CODE|| '-' ||Project1.NAME CODE_NAME , Project1.NAME NAME , Project1.NRIC NRIC , Project1.MEM_TYPE MEM_TYPE FROM ( SELECT Extent1.MEM_ID MEM_ID , Extent1.MEM_CODE MEM_CODE , Extent1.MEM_TYPE MEM_TYPE , Extent1.NAME NAME , Extent1.NRIC NRIC FROM ORG0001D Extent1 WHERE ( 1 = Extent1.STUS ) AND ( Extent1.MEM_TYPE = 3 ) ) Project1 ORDER BY Project1.MEM_CODE ASC

SELECT GroupBy1.A1 C1 , GroupBy1.A2 C2 FROM ( SELECT MIN(Extent2.SALES_ORD_NO) A1 , MAX(Extent2.SALES_ORD_NO) A2 FROM SVC0001D Extent1 JOIN SAL0001D Extent2 ON Extent2.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.AS_SO_ID ) GroupBy1
